p: HCA ( 30), the main active ingredient of G. cambogia extracts, presents effects of inhibiting the recapture of serotonin, inhibiting acetylcholinesterase, increasing the oxidation of fatty acids, and reducing lipogenesis [ 85]. The serotoninergic effects of HCA ( 30) are worrisome and can contribute to serotonin syndrome when combined with serotonin recapture inhibitors [ 109].
